clinical_history: Patient with thyroid nodule under assessment.
findings: Focal uptake in mediastinal lymph nodes consistent with post-surgical changes.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in mediastinal lymph nodes with SUVmax 8.61.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
